item.title: Help Invalide number peremeter problem! ASAP
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

I don’t get any error… I had to declare all the variables so it would comile correctly for me, and I didn’t get any errors.

If you are getting the error on the procedure ClickToStartDownload; part, its probably because of the procedure or function the script was asked to do before that. Post what was before it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Invalide number peremeter problem! ASAP
item.dc:creator: @eagertolearn eagertolearn
item.description:
@eagertolearn wrote:

hi i’m upgrading my first script and i’ve got this invalid number problem. I know what i means but i some how couldn’t like the solution. someone plz help. here’s the code.

procedure ClickToStartDownload; begin if(not(findBitmapin(bitcomet,rx,ry,TopLeftCornerX,TopLeftCornerY,ButtomRightCornerX,ButtomRightCornerY)or findbitmapin(bitcometwindowico,rx,ry,TopLeftCornerX,TopLeftCornerY,ButtomRightCornerX,ButtomRightCornerY)))then begin mouse(rx,ry,randx,randy,true); wait(150); mouse(rx,ry,randx,randy,true); writeln('Started Downloading!'); end; end;[code][/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Help Invalide number peremeter problem! ASAP
